Harry Brook is set to captain England for the first time in the one-day international series against Australia after Jos Buttler was ruled out because of his persistent calf injury.
The 1st ODI match of the Australia Tour of England 2024 will see England take on Australia at Trent Bridge, Nottingham on September 19, 2024.
The first of five one-day internationals between England and Australia starts Thursday (September 19, 2024) at Trent Bridge.
Australia to win: Looking at the squad strength of Australia, they are looking stronger and are the favorites to win the game.
ENG vs AUS Win %: ENG=> 42 % AUS=> 58%
Brook's appointment also means England has had a new captain in each international format this summer.
England Predicted Playing 11: Phil Salt (wk), Ben Duckett, Will Jacks, Harry Brook, Sam Jordan Cox, Liam Livingstone, Jacob Bethell, Olly Stone, Jofra Archer, Reece Topley, Adil Rashid.
Australia Predicted Playing 11: Travis Head, Matthew Short, Steve Smith, Marnus Labuschagne, Glenn Maxwell, Mitch Marsh, Josh Inglis, Sean Abbott, Adam Zampa, Mitchell Starc, Josh Hazlewood.
Captaincy Picks: Travis Head, Glenn Maxwell.
Top Picks: Ben Duckett, Liam Livingstone.
